Improvement.S_Description: Your basic starport. You need this to launch constructed starships.
Provides a public place for colonists to buy and sell things.
Provides a public place for colonists to buy and sell things.
Provides a sophisticated public place for colonists to buy and sell things.
Grow food for your colonists using the latest in sustainable intensive farming.
This embassy will provide a place for alien visitors to visit and pick up some of our culture.
Grow enough food to feed 3 billion more people.
Grow enough food to feed 5 billion people.
Grow food for your colonists using the latest in sustainable intensive farming.

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: Turns yellow tiles to useable tiles.
Improvement.S_Description: By pumping the newest bio-chemicals into the planets outermost layers, we can significantly improve its quality.
Increases research on planet.
Increases research on planet.
Increases research on planet.
Increases research on planet.
Increases research on planet.
Increases research on planet.
Increases military/social production.
Increases military/social production.

The basic factory increases this colony's the social + military production on this planet by up to 4 more industrial units. Depending on what percentage of your manufacturing capacity you are using and what percentage of it is directed towards social and military, this factory's capacity will be used.
Increases military/social production.
This sets a particular planet as our manufacturing capital. It increases our manufacturing by 33%.
Magnifies existing production by 10%
Magnifies existing production by 20%
Magnifies existing production by 30%
This sets a particular planet as our research capital. It doubles its research output.
This Super Project sets a particular planet as our financial capital. It increases tax revenues on that planet by 50%.
This sets a particular planet as our political capital. It increases its cultural influence.
This massive research center will give us a 50% improvement to research.
Using just-in-time technology, the Galactic Privateer will protect your trade routes from attack.

Ships in orbit around this appear 5 times mightier than they really are thus making your military might seem greater to potential foes. Aliens tend to look at how strong we are militarily before deciding to go to war. This special building will make our ships in orbit appear twice as strong.
Increase your diplomatic ability by 25% by building the Galactic Showcase.
This center will prevent the planet it is built upon from being conquered culturally.
By suppressing the spread of dissident ideas, this center will give a boost to the base approval rating of whatever planet it's built upon by 20%.
This center increases the power of our influencer starbases by 50%.
Makes all potentially usable tiles instantly usable on all planets under your control.
A step beyond enhancing the quality of the soil, building Habitat Improvement will give scientists the proper facilities for full blown biological recreation.
Through a series of subterranean conduits, we'll have the ability to replenish and strengthen the planet.
Life is better with the Entertainment Network. Over 5000 channels of fun!
Hook up everyone to a planet wide multimedia system.
Death defying fun and adventure for your amusement..
Teams battle it out without gravity
Life is better with the Virtual Center! Quad-D imaging and Octophonic sound rock!
Gives a 25% boost to your planet's invasion defenses.
The banking center will increase the taxes we collect from this planet.
A stock market will significantly improve our economic output on this planet.
This super project will increase the base movement of ships created on this world.
The Cultural Exchange Center will introduce alien travelers to our culture.
To keep our own people loyal, the propaganda center will advertise the strengths of our culture. Increases planetary loyalty by 10%
This proprietary metal will allow all our ships to be 15% more durable (hitpoints).
This trade good will give those who use them a 25% diplomacy ability boost.
This genetically-created spice will increase our population growth rate by an estimated 50%.
This patented crystal design improves the mood of citizens by 20%.
These spices greatly improve the taste of any food by altering themselves to the taste of any alien (+15% to morale).
Give our people the ability to experience VR (+12% to morale).
Xeno Cultural Trends have let us develop new Xeno Cultural 'Threads'! Mass-Produce a new type of clothing that is incredibly soft for a 10% morale boost.
Aid our researchers by 10% with tiny robots who examine technology projects.
Reduces the cost of the Survey Module to zero, allowing you to equip any ship to explore anomalies.
These powerful computers give those who have them a 20% bonus to overall research.
These micro robots give starships a 20% bonus to their repair ability.
This center of advanced soldier training will increase our soldier's abilities by 25%.
Doubles the hit points of ships in orbit around the planet this improvement is built upon.
This Galactic Achievement will vastly increase our sensor range and let us see all ships on the mini-map.
Establish a single galactic stock exchange to improve your civilization's economy by 25%.
Vastly increase this star's influence (+33%) in the galaxy as well as your overall civilization's influence (+10%).
Vastly increase this star's influence (+50%) in the galaxy as well as your overall civilization's influence (+10%).
This incredible restaurant will help spread our cultural influence wide and far (+20%).
This is the ultimate distribution center for spreading our culture. It doubles a star system's influence and increases our overall influence by 33%.
By converting the refuse of society into raw energy we can gain a 25% improvement to our overall economy.
Decommission this building, making the land available for future development.
A high density manufacturing area.
This Super Project will increase the range of your ships by 25%.
This Super Project will give your military production a big boost. The cost? Just a wafer-thin slice of your soul.
This Galactic Achievement will make you more influential when trading with other races, increasing the perceived value of your offers by 50%.
This trade good will increase the base speed of your ships by +1.
This Super Project increases your Miniaturization ability by 15%.
This Super Project increases your Logistics ability by 6.
This Galactic Achievement eliminates the cost of special invasion tactics.
This Galactic Achievement diverts a percentage of all other evil races' background trade revenue to your civilization.
This Galactic Achievement diverts a percentage of all other good races' background trade revenue to your civilization.
This Galactic Achievement diverts a percentage of all other neutral races' background tourism revenue to your civilization.
This Galactic Achievement boosts the defenses of any of your military ships by 20%.
This Galactic Achievement ensures that alien worlds that are ripe for defection defect nearly instantly.
This Galactic Achievement doubles the odds that alien civilizations will surrender to you when they decide to surrender.
Increases research on planet.
Helps to coordinate research between labs on this world.
Increases food production by properly coordinating distribution throughout the planet.
Increases the fertility of patients, making them more likely to produce offspring. Each clinic provides a 25% boost to the planet population growth!
A relaxing vacation spot for all citizens on the planet to enjoy.
Building a Counter-Espionage Center on this planet will make it immune to foreign agents.
Magnifies existing research by 20%
Gladiators compete to bring entertainment to the slaves! Guess who the gladiators are...
The beatings will continue until morale improves.
Death for your amusement..
Offer sacrifices, attend rituals, and take a look at those sacred virgins.
Enough power for 4 billion more Yor.
Enough power for 6 billion Yor.
The ultimate energy source for Yor now at your local convenience stores.
Provides a public place for colonists to buy and sell things.
Traditional pit for slaves to labor.
Increases military/social production but at the cost of prestige.
Increases military/social production at the cost of prestige.
Magnifies the productivity of slave labor.
Magnifies existing production by 20%
Magnifies existing production by 20%
Grow 20% more productive slavelings

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: Increases speed of ships built here.
Improvement.S_Description: Navigation Centers provide specially trained navigators who are paired up with ships built on this world to increase their speed.

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: Increases speed of ships built here.
Improvement.S_Description: Navigation Centers provide specially trained navigators who are paired up with ships built on this world to increase their speed.
By controlling planetary weather, the planet quality can go up by 3 or more.

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: Train Warrior Fanatics for defense...and offense.
Improvement.S_Description: Increases planetary defense by 33% while improving all your soldiers on offensive invasions by 2%.
Increases research on planet.
Increases research on planet.
Increases research on planet.
Increases research on planet.
Healing Pools boost a planet's morale by supplying public areas for the citizens to rest and relax.
Let your citizens' worries wash away beneath the refreshing 'Wellness Falls'.
Using an enhanced form of coral, the 'Tides of Cleansing' are rhythmically perfected waves, heated to the optimum temperature for soothing ones soul.
Mineral rich spring water is tapped to the surface, giving citizens from all walks of life a natural and instant boost in their wellbeing.
The Dark Influence is a planetary improvement that will vastly increase the base planetary influence of the planet it is constructed on.
The Wretched Harvestor increases the manufacturing capability of the planet while also increasing morale. It does this by harvesting the life force of wretched clones.

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: Sacrifice planet quality by -1 to greatly increase productivity.
Improvement.S_Description: The Aul Incinerator will lower the quality of the planet by -1! However, in exchange, it will channel the life force of all it sacrifices into pure productive energy which is used to increase our manufacturing by 30%. Unused tiles will be sacrificed first. Otherwise, it will take the least valuable tile that is occupied.

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: Increase income by stealing from the citizenry.
Improvement.S_Description: Graft of Ages is a building that can only be constructed once per planet. It makes bribery and graft far more efficient and thus brings more money into our coffers.
A place for lowly merchants to get together and do whatever it is they do that we then skim off the top.
The malicious bazaar sends our most ruthless merchants into action in an effort to win the best deal for the empire.
Charging Stalks help channel the spark of life from its ultimate source to our people which allows us to maintain and build our population. It also gives our people a sense of well being.
Charging Stalks help channel the spark of life from its ultimate source to our people which allows us to maintain and build our population. It also gives our people a sense of well being.
Cybernetic species manufacture products and goods through collectives.
Cybernetic species manufacture products and goods through collectives.
Cybernetic species manufacture products and goods through collectives.
Cybernetic species manufacture products and goods through collectives.
Cybernetic species manufacture products and goods through collectives.

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: Expensive but very effective production magnifier
Improvement.S_Description: Increases your production by converting raw resources into usable material much more quickly.

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: Incredibly Expensive but powerful manufacturing magnifier
Improvement.S_Description: Wherever energy is needed on this planet, the distributed energy matrix will provide it instantly greatly increasing production -- at a price.
Through streamlined process, our planet's economy is improved.
The Research Matrix integrates what research is occurring on the planet into the planet's capital resulting in a significant improvement in research. Only one per planet.

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: Provides slight population growth and morale improvement.
Improvement.S_Description: Cybernetic organisms rely on energy stalks for their population management and sense of well being.

Centralize harvesting on the planet with the planetary harvester. It coordinates the thousands of tiny farms around the world to increase food production by 10% and support an addition 3mt of food production on top of that.
Schools increase the knowledge output of society.
Universities provide additional research for the planet.
A massive city dedicated to researching new technology.
The best of the best come here to research new technologies.
The Central Mine is a super mine in which we dig deep into the core of the planet. Only one per planet can be built but it provides significant amounts of resources.

The Temple of Memories is a dedication to our traditional way of life that has been largely wiped out by the sudden leap into an industrialized society. Each world is encouraged to build a temple of memories in order to preserve our history.
Aquatic Transport helps our ships to better transport water between one another, increasing our ships' range and improving this planet's economy.
To a cybernetic species, morale is created from a sense of efficiency. The maintenance grid ensures that citizens are in tip top condition. Only 1 per planet allowed.

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: A place of learning in all its forms
Improvement.S_Description: The innovation complex is a super project that celebrates the ingenuity of this remarkable species. It greatly increases planetary influence, increases ship speed from this planet, and increases research done on this planet.
The space canon makes attacking this planet and invading this planet much more difficult. It also has a slight affect on morale.

The Stellar Forge the Arcean's crowning achievement. With 50,000 years of engineering experience in constructing ships (though ships not capable of FTL travel), the Stellar Forge will increase the hit points of ships built on this world by an astounding 25% and increases economy by 10%.
A place for merchants to meet and negotiate trade deals.
A huge area for merchants to gather to make trades.
This massive complex allows your people to coordinate trade across the planet. One of the most powerful planetary improvements in the known universe.
Dream Conclaves provide a virtual reality like experience for the people which provides an almost unlimited source of entertainment.
A Robotic Farm makes use of advanced robots to grow the food for the population.

The Precursor Library is something found on certain worlds. But we have the unique ability to actually construct one per planet. It provides significant technology production on its own plus magnifies all other research to come after.
This precursor based technology gets its power from a core tap into the planet. We can only build one but it provides a great deal of manufacturing outpuot.
The Molecular Fabricator magnifies how much manufacturing is being done on the planet. It is the most powerful improvement of its type in the known universe.
Industrial Replicators are essentially factories manned by robots.
Industrial Replicators are essentially factories manned by robots.
Industrial Replicators are essentially factories manned by robots.
Using advanced robotics, the Basic Replicator produces some manufacturing output but isn't terribly efficient. It is eerily similar to the Yor Factory Collective.

It is important to note that population on our planets is only the population of citizens. Citizenship can be earned through either military service or by becoming a tax payer. During good economic times, populations can increase dramatically. The Recruiting Center makes it easier for people to register for service which increases our official population.
This planet's copy of our civilization's copy of Precursor knowledge. It also improves the economy and influence of this world.
Automatically takes technology points from other civilizations and improves our espionage ability.

Master Spies inherently bring in technology every turn without cost. Moreover, they are equivalent to multiple normal spies. They are represented in the interface by multiple agents in the UI. The practical result is that our research on this world is increased significantly and our espionage ability is increased by 25 points.
Members of our civilization can now learn the law of Utwig. Moreover, visitors to our worlds can also learn of our laws and way and help spread the truth of our beliefs to the galaxy.
The Order of Utwig teaches the underlying rationale of the Utwig which improves both morale and influence.
This galactic achievement will spread The Way into the galaxy bringing joy and comfort to billions.

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: Improves Influence and directs trade on the world
Improvement.S_Description: The Consulate helps manage the trade and diplomacy of a given planet.
The Dark Energy Lab super project allows us to make use of dark energy as part of all our industry and military to great effect.
The Biosphere Modulator takes our understanding of how species evolve on planets and puts it to use in maximizing the biological stability of a planet. In essence, we make the planet adapt to us.

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: Allows construction of incredibly lethal star ships.
Improvement.S_Description: Uses tremendous levels of dark energy to create the "Doom" armor coating that can be applied to our hulls which gives them a 50% advantage in hit points when built on this planet. It is, however, extremely expensive.
Drathian temples bring joy to the people.
A monument to the guardians of the universe.

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: Ensures our trade routes cannot be destroyed in war.
Improvement.S_Description: Normally a trade route is ended if the mini-freighter between two planets is destroyed too many times. With Freighter Command, you receive an unlimited number of mini-freigthers.

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: Allows us to train mercenaries to fight in other people's wars
Improvement.S_Description: Our mercenaries are in demand across the galaxy. Whenever there's a way, we can make money from it.
This shrine improves the manufacturing capacity, population growth, influence, morale and economy all by 25%.
The Social Matrix sets up a system in which the people can quickly work together more effectively to build up a planet.
There is nothing quite like soldiers who know their cause is just.

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: Increases planet quality for all our worlds.
Improvement.S_Description: The Gaia Vortex generates a type of energy that can be spread across all our worlds. The planet it inhabits sees the greatest level of improvement.
Welcome tourists, we are happy to have you here. Now, step right in here and look closely at the light. That's right...
The maintenance on these structures are painful but they produce immense amounts of research.
The maintenance on these structures are bad but better than they were and produce immense amounts of research.
The maintenance on these are competitive with other civilizations and produce more technology than any other similar tech.

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: Great manufacturing but expensive to maintain
Improvement.S_Description: Manufacturing Matrix's have immense output but severe energy requirements that result in having a very high maintenance cost.

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: Great manufacturing but expensive to maintain
Improvement.S_Description: Manufacturing Matrix's have immense output but severe energy requirements that result in having a very high maintenance cost.

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: Great manufacturing but expensive to maintain
Improvement.S_Description: Manufacturing Matrix's have immense output but severe energy requirements that result in having a very high maintenance cost.
Nothing provides a better reminder of home than our ability to adjust gravity for every condition. Now we can enjoy the amusement of variable gravity.

The Hyperion Matrix is the key equipment that the Thalan brought with them into this space-time. The planet that constructs it will be immensely powerful. Unfortunately, it can only be used once. It is, by far, the most powerful construction project in the known universe.

Knowing that life would be harsh adapting to an alien world, the Temporoal Entertainment Matrix is an amazing technlogical feat of engineering. It provides holographic experiences that are beyond anything available anywhere thanks to its integrated Gravitronic power source.

It is impossible to simply transplant an entire interstellar economy from scratch. However, the Economic Direction Unit can replicate a wide variety of precious items that can be traded to greatly enhance the economic output of the planet it is built on.
A planetwide celebration of the pursuit of money.
Our race needs to meditate to manage stress. Recuperation Centers provide an environment to regain our sense of oneness.

Improvement.S_BriefDescription: All ships in orbit will be used to defend against attack on all planets.
Improvement.S_Description: The Orbital Command Center is designed to coordinate the defense of a planet by having all the ships in orbit work together for the defense of the planet.
